00006 ID_TEXT = 10000
00007 ID_TEXTCTRL = 10001
00008 
00009 class Options(scrolled.ScrolledPanel):
00010     '''takes a list of label/default text box options in the 
00011 [(,),(,),...] format'''
00012     def __init__(self, parent, options):
00013         scrolled.ScrolledPanel.__init__(self, parent, -1)
00014         vbox = wx.BoxSizer( wx.VERTICAL )
00015         gridSizer = wx.GridSizer( 0, 2, 0, 0 )
00016         for pair in options:
00017             label = wx.StaticText( parent, ID_TEXT, pair[0], wx.DefaultPosition, wx.DefaultSize, 0 )
00018             gridSizer.Add( label, 0, wx.ALIGN_RIGHT|wx.ALL, 5 )
00019             text = wx.TextCtrl( parent, ID_TEXTCTRL, pair[1], wx.DefaultPosition, [160,-1], 0 )
00020             gridSizer.Add( text, 0, wx.ALIGN_RIGHT|wx.ALL, 5 )
00021 
00022         vbox.Add( gridSizer, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER|wx.ALL, 5 )
00023         self.SetSizer(vbox)
00024         self.SetAutoLayout(1)
00025         self.SetupScrolling()
